title: HOTake Men's Casual Crochet Shirts Short Sleeve Button Down Guayabera Shirts
description: Crafted from a lightweight fabric with softness and breathability, this mens shirt is comfortable to wear, even on the warmest of days.
The camp collar on this guayabera is wider and creates a lower cut v-neck than a traditional point collar shirt which ensures a more relaxed and has a retro flair.
Classic camp collar with kind of see-through design, feel the breeze over your skin and feel like you're on vacation with this vintage sheer mesh shirt.
Well cut and fitted for most figures with the right size. Perfect for holiday, beach, daily casual, party, dating, club and more as you like. An ideal gift for your loved one or yourself.
Machine washable. Hang or lay flat to dry. Do not bleach. Refer to the size chart to ensure an appropriate fit.
